title: Australian Engineers Unveil Breakthrough in Concentrating Solar Thermodynamics - Microgrid Media
summary: CSIRO, an Australian research organization, has developed a new Concentrating Solar Thermodynamics (CST) system using ceramic particles to capture and store heat more efficiently. This innovation could lead to higher working temperatures and longer thermal storage durations, making CST a more cost-effective and efficient renewable energy source for heavy industry decarbonization in Australia and beyond.
official_company_name: Commonwealth Scientific and Industrial Research Organisation
product_or_process: Concentrating Solar Thermodynamics (CST) system using ceramic particles for heat capture and storage
